Traits.Name: Winged
Traits.Description: Gain flying at the start of their turn. Lose flying if shoved, stunned, dazed, or staggered.

Actions.Name: Polaris
Actions.Description: Mark a visible space. At the end of each turn past this one (foe or allied), roll a d6. On a 6, a meteor smashes into the space, inflicting light damage and frostbite to all characters within.
